scripts.contract:label: npx ts-node scripts/contract/apply_label.ts
scripts.spec:diff: bash -c 'git show origin/main:spec/openapi.json > /tmp/main-spec.json 2>/dev/null && openapi-diff /tmp/main-spec.json spec/openapi.json || echo "No diff - either no origin/main or files are identical"'
scripts.sdk:gen: npm run sdk:gen:typescript && npm run sdk:gen:python
scripts.sdk:verify: npm run sdk:gen && git diff --exit-code sdks/
scripts.release:prepare: npm run spec:diff && (test -f openapi/diff/classification.json && npm run semver:check || echo "ℹ️ No classification file found, skipping semver check") && npm run changelog:check
scripts.prepare: lefthook install || echo 'Lefthook not available, skipping hook installation'
